quotes.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
